title: docs: mention additional details about arguments
body:
### Specify which documentation you found a problem with

[curl_easy_cleanup](https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_easy_cleanup.html)

### The problem

There are other types of security rules that are missing in the documentation. I believe incorporating these rules could help developers learn how to correctly use APIs and reduce the risk of security issues.

I will provide a table describing the missing security rules:
| API | parameter index (begin with 1) | Security rules | URL |
|:----------:|:----------:|:----------:|:----------:|
| curl_slist_free_all | 1 | parameter must not be used later (without re-initialize) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_slist_free_all.html |
| curl_multi_cleanup | 1 | parameter must not be used later (without re-initialize) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_multi_cleanup.html |
| curl_easy_strerror | 1 | parameter must be initialized using xxx (other API) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_easy_strerror.html |
| curl_free | 1 | parameter must be initialized using xxx (other API) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_free.html |
| curl_multi_add_handle | 1 | parameter must be initialized using xxx (other API) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_multi_add_handle.html |
| curl_multi_cleanup | 1 | parameter must be initialized using xxx (other API) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_multi_cleanup.html |
| curl_multi_perform | 2 | parameter must be initialized using xxx (other API) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_multi_perform.html |
| curl_mime_addpart | 1 | parameter must be initialized using xxx (other API) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_mime_addpart.html |
| curl_mime_init | 1 | parameter must be initialized using xxx (other API) | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_mime_init.html |
| curl_easy_cleanup | 1 | Do not call this API multiple times for the same parameter. | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_easy_cleanup.html |
| curl_slist_free_all | 1 | Do not call this API multiple times for the same parameter. | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_slist_free_all.html |
| curl_free | 1 | Do not call this API multiple times for the same parameter. | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_free.html |
| curl_url_cleanup | 1 | Do not call this API multiple times for the same parameter. | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_url_cleanup.html |
| curl_multi_cleanup | 1 | Do not call this API multiple times for the same parameter. | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_multi_cleanup.html |
| curl_multi_cleanup | 1 | Do not call this API multiple times for the same parameter. | https://curl.se/libcurl/c/curl_multi_cleanup.html |
